Step 2: Who was Morris County named after?
Answer: Morris County was named after Lewis Morris.

Answer: Lewis Morris was a signer of the United States Declaration of Independence, as well as a chief justice of the New York Supreme Court.

Step 4: Was Morris County named after Lewis Morris the chief justice?
